reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 316/18: REVIEW OF JOURNEYPERSON TO APPRENTICE RATIOS
reg_info.reg_name_text: REVIEW OF JOURNEYPERSON TO APPRENTICE RATIOS
reg_info.act_under: Ontario College of Trades and Apprenticeship Act, 2009

content.content: 1. The period referred to in subsection 60 (4) of the Act within which the Board shall cause a review to be made of each journeyperson to apprentice ratio that has been prescribed is extended to April 29, 2019. 2. This Regulation is revoked on April 30, 2019.
content.raw_html:
1. The period referred to in subsection 60 (4) of the Act within which the Board shall cause a review to be made of each journeyperson to apprentice ratio that has been prescribed is extended to April 29, 2019.

2. This Regulation is revoked on April 30, 2019.

content.content: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
content.raw_html: 3. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).
